medical_history.history_of_present_illness: The patient felt fine until noon when he experienced epigastric pain and nausea. He vomited several times, and the pain migrated to the lower abdomen. He has not had anything to eat since the onset of pain.
medical_history.past_medical_history: Chronic abdominal pain ascribed to increased acid when stressed, manifests as bloody diarrhea 2x/year and occasional epigastric abdominal pain. Past surgeries include finger surgery. Workup has been negative including colonoscopy.
